<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Partition by MD5 hash. We only need a few bits for evenness as the number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of partitions will generally be in the 1-2 figure range; the low 16 bits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (R&#91;0&#93; | (R&#91;1&#93; &lt;&lt; 8)) % <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
